Projects
Things I have worked on.

#python #latex

tao2tex

Goes through a HTML version of one of Prof Tao's blogposts, and spits out a beautiful LaTeX version.

Leverages Python and BeautifulSoup. Correctly hyperlinks, references, boxes definitions and theorems, and includes all comments.

#python #latex

tao2tex

Goes through a HTML version of one of Prof Tao's blogposts, and spits out a beautiful LaTeX version.

Leverages Python and BeautifulSoup. Correctly hyperlinks, references, boxes definitions and theorems, and includes all comments.

  Repository
